description.narrative: Agri-business development support to young agripreneurs

With funding from Argidius Foundation, ICCO Cooperation supports 1,000 youth (18-35 years) with an agribusiness in Nebbi district or Lango sub region in Northern Uganda. We provide different services to them, including trainings, coaching, mentoring and access to finance support.
We support young agripreneurs with a business in Nebbi district. The activities are mainly implemented in Nebbi.

activity-description.narrative: Training, coaching, mentoring, access to finance support.

description.narrative: Youth with an agribusiness in different districts of Lango sub region are supported - activities implemented from Lira.

activity-description.narrative: Trainings, coaching, mentoring, access to finance support.
